mapper.sql: id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, mall_img, mall_info_img, mall_content, mall_info_content, mall_des, is_deleted, reserved_field
mapper.select: select id, mall_img, mall_info_img, mall_content, mall_info_content, mall_des from special_mall where is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY gmt_modified DESC limit 6
